zh.name: 后端开发最佳实践
zh.desc: 高质量后端架构、API 设计和 API 文档编写规范。
zh.full_desc: 不仅是写代码，而是写出优秀的系统。该技能涵盖了 RESTful API 设计、分布式系统一致性、数据库索引优化以及错误处理标准。它是你从普通开发者成长为架构师的必经之路。

en.name: Backend Dev Guidelines
en.desc: Standards for high-quality backend architecture, API design, and documentation.
en.full_desc: It's not just about coding; it's about building great systems. This skill covers RESTful API design, database index optimization, distributed consistency, and error handling standards to help you grow from a developer into an architect.
